block.p: BASKETBALL National Basketball Association DALLAS MAVERICKS - Waived F Ace Custis, G Mike Jones and F Jamal Kendrick. MIAMI HEAT - Released G Rick Brunson and G-F Ron Hale.
BASKETBALL National Basketball Association DALLAS MAVERICKS - Waived F Ace Custis, G Mike Jones and F Jamal Kendrick. MIAMI HEAT - Released G Rick Brunson and G-F Ron Hale.

FOOTBALL National Football League DENVER BRONCOS - Signed WR Scottie Montgomery from their practice squad. Waived OT Melvin Tuten. NEW YORK JETS - Signed FB-TE Jake Moreland. Terminated the contract of WR Vincen Brisby.

HOCKEY National Hockey League ALTANTA THRASHERS - Activated C Patrik Stefan from injured reserve. Reassigned RW Bryan Adams to Orlando of the IHL. CAROLINA HURRICANES - Recalled D Mike Rucinski and D Greg Kuznik from Cincinnati of the IHL. East Coast Hockey League CHARLOTTE CHECKERS - Placed G Scott Balley on 14-day injured reserve. FLORIDA EVERBLADES - Activated D Bryce Macken from injured reserve and waived him. Placed F Matt Demarski on seven-day injured reserve. Added D Jon Sorg to the roster. GREENSBORO GENERALS - Signed LW Darryl Campbell. NEW ORLEANS BRASS - Waived RW Craig Desjarlais. Added RW Ville Liukko to the roster. SOUTH CAROLINA STINGRAYS - Placed LW Zach Ham on seven-day injured reserve. Activated G Blaine Russell from injured reserve and waived him. Added D Scott Swanson to the roster. WHEELING NAILERS - Signed F Derek Smith, F Butch Kaebel and D Sean Seyferth. Released D Jason Ricci. Placed F Rob Millar on seven-day injured reserve. Added G Grant Van Laar to the roster. Western Professional Hockey League AUSTIN ICE BATS - Announced D Phillip Plante has been recalled by Houston of the IHL. CENTRAL TEXAS STAMPEDE - Signed D Rob Guinn. Placed D John Murphy oninjured reserve, retroactive to Oct. 19. TUPELO T-REX - Activated F Dave Jesiolowski from the suspended list.
